title: San Juan Island National Historical Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit                   Hike the South Beach Trail at American Camp               American Camp was sometimes fun and games.               Heighten Your Experience on Young Hill               Friday Harbor has Plenty of Shops and...               English Camp today               Earn a Junior Ranger Badge Here or Online         Â   Thinking about a San Juans get-away?We'll help you plan your trip.Come and celebrate where Great Britain and United States demonstrated that it is possible for individuals and nations to settle their differences peacefully without resorting to violence. But where to begin? This "Plan Your Visit" section has all kinds of helpful tips about things to do, places to go, eating and sleeping, and current conditions. Dig deeper for information about accessibility, directions, operating hours and seasons, fees and passes, permits and reservations, and brochures. Visit the official online store for books, maps, and guides to the Pacific Northwest, operated through Discover Your Northwest.
